availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaac T. Crouch (Bath County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Isaac Crouch and Margaret Crouch. Married to Malinda Crouch. Father of Fletcher Crouch, Nannie Crouch, Pruda Crouch, Eliza Crouch, and Mary Crouch. Farmer in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Division 2, p. 31B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Owingsville, p. 206.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Owingsville, p. 49A.
